Security reminderThis studio is for education and experimentation. Do not upload production data or secrets. Outputs are demos; review before using anywhere safety-critical or financial.

1. Signals you want to see

Logging depthNormal
Metrics coverageKey business metrics
TracingKey flows only

Normal logs: requests + warnings. Key business metrics wired. Key flows traced end-to-end. Risk: too much can get noisy/expensive.

2. Observability architecture sketch

Conceptual flow from services to dashboards and alerts.

Service A
Service B
Service C
↧ logs/metrics/traces ↧
Collector / Observability platform
Normal logs, Key metrics, Key traces
Further practice
Alerting

3. Alert sanity check

Alert sanity score25/100

Better, but trim noise and add runbooks.
